descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm82/Avliden/DBWeaps.png[/IMG]

[font=\"Impact\"][size=\"12\"][color=\"#008000\"]UPDATE 5:[/color][/size][/font]
Fixed grindstone issue.

[font=\"Impact\"][size=\"12\"][color=\"#008000\"]UPDATE 4:[/color][/size][/font]
Added Dragonbone Greatsword (Two Handed) <= Not completely happy with it.

[font=\"Impact\"][size=\"12\"][color=\"#008000\"]UPDATE 3:[/color][/size][/font]
Added Dragonbone Longsword (One Handed)

[font=\"Impact\"][size=\"12\"][color=\"#008000\"]UPDATE 2:[/color][/size][/font]
Added Dragonbone Waraxe (One Handed)

[font=\"Impact\"][size=\"12\"][color=\"#008000\"]UPDATE:[/color][/size][/font]
Added Dragonbone Hammer (One Handed)

[font=\"Impact\"][size=\"12\"][color=\"#008000\"]Story Behind:[/color][/size][/font]
The dragonbone weapons use an alloy of Steel and Ebony as a bracing and Dragon Bone as the main strength of the weapon. Sharpened dragonbone is believed to be the most deadly material in Skyrim. 

Dragonbone is extremely hard to smith. However, once it is it will never dull. And will last for several lifetimes.

[font=\"Impact\"][size=\"12\"][color=\"#008000\"]Info:[/color][/size][/font]
The textures are 1024x1024 to keep inline with the HiRes DLC.

Sorry for the delay, Lots of life got in the road, for now I\'ll release the Dagger. 
I\'ll finnish the rest shortly.

This includes the recipe and sharpening ability.
Any feedback you might have will help.

[font=\"Impact\"][size=\"12\"][color=\"#008000\"]Instructions:[/color][/size][/font]
To install simply extract the \'Data\' folder from the archive to your *Main* skyrim directory and overwrite.
author: DagothBalls

files.name: Dragonbone Weapon Set with grindstone fix
